title: Only for Him, Part One: Proposal
description: From USA Today Bestselling Author and the creator of the Harmless series, comes the first ever Harmless SERIAL. You met Addy and Vic in Surrender, and now you get their story. Only available on Melissa's website for FREE!Blurb:Addy and Vic are spending New Year's Eve together. Not so much by choice but by circumstance. It ends up being more than either of them expected, but in the end, Vic has one thing he wants from her in order to continue their affair.
author: Melissa Schroeder
